::Feline::

she thought a bit.  She noticed that when the Dark One pushed her, 
Zardus made no effort to defend her.  She also noiced that this 
DarkOne showed immediate displeasure with her.  She would have t 
rethink her stratagies.  She knew she had DevilDuer in her paws.  Now 
for the others.  If she couldn't have Zardus, she would have the rest 
of the crew.  She didn't want to be the leader, but second in command 
would suit her nicely.  She thought about Dark One.  he was a good 
looking bot.  And he deffinately peaked her interests.  Him and 
Zardus may be tough guys, but still guys.  she smiled to herself.  
She knew that all she had to do was push the right buttons.  And all 
she had to do was bide her time and keep trying untill she found out 
what the weakness was.  

She purred aloud so the two could hear her.  She jumpd down and 
walked over to Dark One.  She brushed up against his leg.  She looked 
up at him with her deep cat eyes.  Then she walked over to Zardus and 
sat next to him.  She moved his hand with her head indicating that 
she wanted him to pet her.
